name: Lifeless Galaxy
description:
Lifeless Galaxy is an interactive fiction empowered by Twine. It's based on a short story written by me. The story is about an alien scientist, who has been studying the Universe for the last 2 000 years or so. His goal is to find a lifeless galaxy — and, well, it's not such an easy task as it seems to be.

The game is short and shouldn't take more than 30 minutes to play, depending on your reading speed and your choices. Yes, choices matter.

Features:

  • Sci-fi story with a unique main character;
  • 6 different endings;
  • Nice design;
  • Some music (and a sidebar with a 'Mute' button on it);
  • It's free!

The background image of the game is taken from this guy. Music from this website. I also use harlowe audio library.

Привет!

Если вы это читаете, значит, умеете читать по-русски! Это отлично, ведь в таком случае вы сможете насладиться моей небольшой игрой на оригинальном языке. Советую скачать именно русскую версию — архив "LifelessGalaxyRU.rar". Спасибо!
